products.description: Ecopots have a unique natural look and feel, with clean, simple lines. This minimalist design will add a stylish touch to your home and garden. These pots are lightweight and  durable and are made from recycled materials and completely recyclable.
The Ecopots Amsterdam collection feels at home both indoors and outdoors & is available in a variety of classic colours and sizes.
These pots are lightweight and  durable and are made from recycled materials and completely recyclable.
The Ecopots Amsterdam Wheels is perfect for effortlessly moving around your favourite plants. Ideal for your patio, balcony or office space.
It has eight individually-lined pockets allowing different herbs to grow in harmony. Comes flat packed, but is easy to assemble with detailed instructions.
